article: japanese prime minister shinzo abe agreed with his australian counterpart john howard during a telephone conversation on thursday to go on to work together on issues such as reconstruction in iraq , countermeasures against global warming , and the korean peninsula nuclear issue , kyodo news reported .
abstract: abe howard talk through telephone reaffirming cooperation on international issues
candidates: japanese prime minister shinzo abe agreed with his australian counterpart john howard during a telephone conversation on thursday.
japan and australia agree to work together on issues such as reconstruction in iraq and global warming.
japan and australia also agreed to work on the korean peninsula nuclear issue.
